titleStmt.title: A poore mans mite. A letter of a religious man of the Order of Saint Benedict, vnto a sister of his, concerning the rosarie or psalter of our blessed Ladie, commonly called the Beades.
titleStmt.author: Batt, Antonie.

notesStmt.note: Written by Antonie Batt. Cf. STC (2nd ed.) and Allison & Rogers.
Place of publication and printer from STC (2nd ed.).
Head-pieces; tail-pieces; letters IHS with maltese cross on t.p.
Reproduction of original in: University of Texas at Austin. Library.
